name: Grayscale CNN Model
description: A CNN model trained on grayscale gesture images to recognize various hand gestures in a simple black-and-white format.

name: CNN Mediapipe
description: A CNN model that uses Mediapipe to extract key gesture features, which are then used to emulate segmentation in a machine learning pipeline.

name: CNN, Unet Segmentation
description: A CNN model where images are first segmented using a Unet-based hand segmentation model, then passed through a CNN for final gesture recognition.

name: RGB CNN Model
description: A CNN model trained on RGB gesture images to recognize various hand gestures in full color.
